src:
Cristiano Ronaldo Marah-Marah Saat Ditarik Keluar, Apa Kata Maurizio Sarri?
07 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus harus berjuang keras untuk mengalahkan Lokomotiv Moscow, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Bermain di kandang lawan, si Nyonya Tua sukses membungkus 3 poin lewat kemenangan 2-1.
Pertandingan matchday 4 Grup D Liga Champions 2019/20 itu jelas tidak mudah. Kemenangan Juve baru ditentukan lewat gol Douglas Costa di pengujung laga, tepatnya menit ke-90+3. Bos Juve, Maurizio Sarri mengakui timnya bermain kurang maksimal.
Selain itu, ada insiden yang melibatkan Cristiano Ronaldo menjelang akhir pertandingan. Superstar Juventus ini tampak marah-marah ketika ditarik keluar Sarri di menit ke-81.

Mengapa demikian? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo Upset When Pulled Out, What Did Maurizio Sarri Say?
Nov 7, 2019, 5:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus must fight hard to defeat Lokomotiv Moscow on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Playing at home to the opponent, the Old Lady successfully wrapped up 3 points with a 2-1 victory.
Matchday 4 match Group D of the 2019/20 Champions League is clearly not easy. Juve's victory was determined by Douglas Costa's goal at the end of the match, precisely the 90th minute + 3. Juve boss Maurizio Sarri admitted his team played less than the maximum.
In addition, there was an incident involving Cristiano Ronaldo towards the end of the match. The Juventus superstar looked angry when pulled out of Sarri in the 81st minute.

Why is that? Read below, Bolaneters!
